snippet: It was, they said, "the largest prize contest in photographic history." The Rush Rhees Library in Rochester, N.Y., houses a collection of photographs from the first-ever picture contest sponsored by the Eastman Kodak Company.
abstract: It was, they said, "the largest prize contest in photographic history." The Rush Rhees Library in Rochester, N.Y., houses a collection of photographs from the first-ever picture contest sponsored by the Eastman Kodak Company.

byline.original: By KERRI MACDONALD and DARCY EVELEIGH

headline.main: An Amateur Snapshot of Kodak's Early Days
